casebody.data:
Marcia BUTTS, Personal Representative of the Estate of Betty Simms-Norman, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ST. JOHN MACOMB-OAKLAND HOSPITAL, St. John Providence Health System, Seth B. Parker, M.D., and Great Lakes Medicine, PLC, Defendants-Appellants. SC: 158172
COA: 334892 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before October 2, 2018.
